scripts.package: npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../esti-mate.zip . && cd .. && echo "✅ Extension package ready for both Chrome and Firefox stores: esti-mate.zip"
scripts.prepare-release: npm run version:patch && npm run build && mkdir -p releases && cd dist && zip -r ../releases/esti-mate-v$(node -p "require('../package.json').version").zip . && cd .. && npm run source-code && echo "✅ Release package created: releases/esti-mate-v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version").zip" && echo "✅ Source code package created: releases/esti-mate-source-v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version").zip"
scripts.source-code: mkdir -p releases && zip -r releases/esti-mate-source-v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version").zip . -x 'node_modules/*' 'dist/*' 'releases/*' '*.zip' '.git/*' '.idea/*' 'doc/*' '.claude/*' 'CLAUDE.md' '.DS_Store' && echo '✅ Source code package ready for Firefox submission'
